MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G66 postcode area of Kirkintilloch, affecting properties in Hillhead Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 00:03AM. Our engineers are on their way to Shells substation to investigate and repair a suspected blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 00:45AM on 27 October 2020.
